user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to prepare a detailed performance and budget report for me (mark@optitech.solutions). Instruct her to review her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Detailed Performance & Budget Report

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well.  
Could you please prepare a detailed performance and budget report for the Software Development department? When compiling the data, kindly review any relevant information in your Gmail and our shared Notion workspace to ensure everything is up to date and comprehensive.

Please let me know if you need any clarifications or additional inputs.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
Mark  
Head of Software Development  
mark@optitech.solutions

final_output:
